current.1-desc: Fixed a critical bug where persona images would reset on restart. Enhanced initial setup flow and improved UI clarity.
current.2-desc: Added missing translations for Chinese and Japanese, resolved shortcut key bugs and minor UI issues.
current.3-desc: Updated user manual links for easier access to help and guidance.

previous.3-desc: Automatic to-do list generation and tracking for complex tasks
